mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_shop.order ( userId, ord_stat, delivery_fee, total_prod_pric, total_bene_pric, total_ord_pric, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{ord_stat}, #{delivery_fee}, #{total_prod_pric}, #{total_bene_pric}, #{total_ord_pric}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{reg_id}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{up_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT ord_seq, ord_stat, delivery_fee, total_prod_pric, total_bene_pric, total_ord_pric, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id, userId FROM book_shop.order WHERE ord_seq = #{ord_seq};

SELECT ord_seq, delivery_fee, total_prod_pric, total_bene_pric, total_ord_pric, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id, userId, ord_stat FROM book_shop.order ORDER BY
ord_seq DESC ord_seq ASC
ord_seq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE book_shop.order SET ord_stat = #{ord_stat}, delivery_fee = #{delivery_fee}, total_prod_pric = #{total_prod_pric}, total_bene_pric = #{total_bene_pric}, total_ord_pric = #{total_ord_pric}, up_date = now(), up_id = #{up_id} WHERE ord_seq = #{ord_seq}
